SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.openmobster.cloud.api.sync
Annotation Type ChannelInfo

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface ChannelInfo

Annotation which carries configuration information about a Mobile Bean Channel

A Channel serves as a gateway for integrating on-device data objects with server side backend storage systems such as relational databases, content repositories, or Enterprise systems like CRMs, ERPs etc

Author:
openmobster@gmail.com

Required Element Summary
 String mobileBeanClass
          The fully qualified class name of the Mobile Bean that will be processed by this Channel
 String uri
          A unique identifier that allows the mobile system to route data object traffic to the proper channel
 
Optional Element Summary
 long updateCheckInterval
          Specifies how often this channel should be queries for updates to be pushed as notifications (comet, mobile push, etc).
 

Element Detail

uri

public abstract String uri
A unique identifier that allows the mobile system to route data object traffic to the proper channel

Returns:
a unique channel identifier

mobileBeanClass

public abstract String mobileBeanClass
The fully qualified class name of the Mobile Bean that will be processed by this Channel

Returns:
fully qualified class name of the Mobile Bean

updateCheckInterval

public abstract long updateCheckInterval
Specifies how often this channel should be queries for updates to be pushed as notifications (comet, mobile push, etc). Default Value is : 20000ms

Returns:
an updateCheckInterval
Default:
20000L
